extendedInfo.description: Our redesigned Alibaba Android app allows you to access the worldâs leading online B2B marketplace wherever you are. Here you can find over 2 million suppliers and 270 million products. Search products, send inquiries and view quotations anywhere, anytime â right from your phone. Key Features:â¢Easily search millions of products on Alibaba.comâ¢Send purchase inquiries directly from your phoneâ¢Get personalized product recommendations by adding categories you are interested in to the home screenâ¢Save your favorite products and communicate with suppliers on-the-go

reviews.title: To many permissions.
reviews.comment: Why?
reviews.author: Andrew Carson

reviews.title: Very Good!
reviews.comment: it is useful ,and better than the old version,i like it!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It is better than the old version. I like it!
reviews.author: fish zeng

reviews.title: bad scrolling
reviews.comment: very bad response in touchscreen scrolling. seems that it wants to select instead of scrolling down. making this unusable unfortunately. seems rather slow...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked out what I needed to do.
reviews.comment: Now that I\'ve found out how to open an account using my pc, this app might now become very useful. The developers should really put this info into the app, as well as well allowing people to sign up for an account just using the app. Giving people no info about what they need to do is pretty useless. Also, this app needs a lot of development look forward to further updates in the near future.
reviews.author: Arty Artysen

reviews.title: Just OKAY
reviews.comment: Very limited search options. Website has more search options based on country/region. Interface is fine. I UNISTALLED the app within 10mins of installation although I am a very heavy user of Alibaba.   The app needs BIG improvement
reviews.author: Fawad Faiza

reviews.title: Aweful
reviews.comment: This app is ridiculously slow, even though I\'m using it on Xperia Z. The devs need to make improvements, big improvements. This app is sluggish, the touch is less of a touch and more of a drag.
reviews.author: Lucksee Ali

reviews.comment: Love when an app asks for permission to update and doesn\'t pull all your internet when you most need it!\tLove when an app asks for permission to update and doesn\'t pull all your internet when you most need it!  Really appreciate it!
reviews.author: Gerardo Garza

reviews.title: Unusable.this app is dead
reviews.comment: Very difficult to login to account . It log out automatically everytime . No option to keep you logged in. I don\'t even think the app is designed for touchscreen devices
reviews.author: Rajender Kumar

reviews.title: Love It !!
reviews.comment: I love this app, Only thing i find is my tracking number never works on the royal mail website. Am i doing something wrong?
reviews.author: Natalie Annesley

reviews.title: Limited Search Results
reviews.comment: I was excited to use this app as I am a returning customer, however this app is terrible. The search results say hundreds of results for a search but the app stops around 30 and won\'t let you go further. Shame.
reviews.author: Ger Bacon

reviews.title: The stpd app ever seen
reviews.comment: Unable to do the simplest acts like move, copy, paste, moving cursor. Unable to read sent massages. There\'s no password remembering. PLS fix it.
reviews.author: Nodir Melikov

reviews.title: The messaging doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: The message gets forwarded to my email. When I click reply, it takes me to alibaba site but it says message invalid. Very inconvenient. Please fix. I give 5 star.
reviews.author: RaC Lars

reviews.title: Can make better
reviews.comment: Username and pass does.not save has to enter everytime. Other then that it\'s ok to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nop
reviews.comment: This application does not allow to see detailed pictures of the products and vids of the company
reviews.author: Eman El-Sayed

reviews.title: Improvement required
reviews.comment: This application should also contain trade manager chat feature. I am also getting error in refine option. Please solve the issue and add the trade manager in this app.
reviews.author: Jahanzeb khan

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Amazing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but.
reviews.comment: Good but will only let me see the first few results on any page.
reviews.author: Sebastian Sheppard

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Alibaba is great and this app is great for me to source products while on the road.
reviews.author: A Google User
